article: after taking a hands-off approach to arnold schwarzenegger 's campaign for california governor , president george w. bush rushed wednesday toward embracing him , setting the stage for an alliance that could reap a rich electoral windfall for republicans next year .
abstract: bush praises schwarzenegger ahead of california meeting
